TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CustomErrorsRedirectMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies values for how the URL of the original request is handled when a custom error page is displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks You use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsRedirectMode> values when you set the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection.RedirectMode%2A> property.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsRedirectMode ResponseRedirect = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Display the error page and change the URL of the original request.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsRedirectMode ResponseRewrite = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Display the error page without changing the original URL.
